#summary eper is a set of tools for [http://www.erlang.org Erlang] Performance tuning and debugging

= Introduction =

Since Erlang doesn't have a very intuitive performance model, good tools for performance tuning is a must to get the most out of your system.


= Details =

Tools that make up eper;
  * [sherk]
  * [gperf]
  * [dtop]
  * [redbug]
